fields.name: Woodchuck Chucked
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*
> When a party member uses attacks to obtain wood, they have a 25% chance to get an additional log of wood.

fields.name: Bloodline of the Crimson Oni
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*
> Arataki Kesagiri DMG is increased by 35% of Arataki Itto’s DEF.

fields.name: Arataki Ichiban
fields.value:
*Unlocked Automatically*
> When Arataki Itto uses consecutive Arataki Kesagiri, he obtains the following effects:

> Each slash causes the subsequent slash to have 10% more ATK SPD. Max ATK SPD increase is 30%.
> Greatly increases his resistance to interruption.

These effects will be cleared once he stops performing consecutive slashes.
